hadiths.text: Narrated Abu Qatadah:The Prophet (sal Allaahu alayhi wa sallam) said: When any one of you urinates, he must not touch his penis with his right hand, and when he goes to relieve himself he must not wipe himself with his right hand (in the privy), and when he drinks, he must not drink in one breath

chapter.ara-name: باب كَرَاهِيَةِ مَسِّ الذَّكَرِ بِالْيَمِينِ فِي الاِسْتِبْرَاءِ
chapter.eng-name: Disapproval Of Touching One's Private Part With The Right Hand While Purifying
